para.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
"LEA" means a local education agency, which is the District of Columbia Public Schools system or an individual or a group of public charter schools operating under a single charter.
"OSSE" means the Office of the State Superintendent of Education.
"Period products" means a tampon, a sanitary pad, or liner.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Expanding Student Access to Period Products Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-302, Jan. 24, 2022, 69 DCR 000620).
